title: Looking for Blitzcrank main for Flex Diamond+
body: Looking for a flex buddy that preferably mains blitzcrank for some free wins. I'm D5 soloq, D3 flex and challenger ranked team. Make sure you're within plat-master in flex so it lets you duo. ggwp and free wins

replies.body:
hi im bronze 5 but play like a challenger.. im a diamond smurf i swear to go you can ask my friends 

Said every bronze player ever...

(nah but in all seriousness i would but im a gold scrub :(     )
